name: Robotics Arm Control System
description: Developed a control system for a robotic arm using Arduino and ROS for precise movements.

name: IoT Smart Home System
description: Built an IoT smart home system with sensors, actuators, and a mobile app for remote monitoring and control.

name: Autonomous Drone Navigation
description: Implemented autonomous navigation for drones using computer vision and path planning algorithms.

name: Industrial IoT Monitoring Solution
description: Designed and deployed an industrial IoT monitoring solution for real-time data collection and analysis.

name: 3D Printing Automation
description: Developed software and hardware automation for a 3D printing process to optimize production efficiency.

name: Machine Learning for Predictive Maintenance
description: Implemented machine learning models to predict equipment failures in manufacturing environments.

name: Augmented Reality Maintenance Guide
description: Created an augmented reality guide for equipment maintenance to improve technician efficiency.

name: Energy Monitoring and Optimization
description: Developed a system for monitoring energy consumption and optimizing usage based on real-time data.

name: Blockchain-based Supply Chain Tracking
description: Implemented blockchain technology to track and verify the supply chain process for transparency and security.

name: Virtual Reality Training Simulations
description: Created virtual reality simulations for training purposes to enhance learning outcomes in complex scenarios.
